ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] LAMENT and undead?
ygData.msgSnippet: Um. Kurn s Tower is going to be entirely green to 24 (except MAYBE the Burnyai if you go down) At 20, Meara went with a group to Kurn s Tower and it was
ygData.messageBody:
Um. Kurn's Tower is going to be entirely green to 24 (except MAYBE
the Burnyai if you go down) At 20, Meara went with a group to Kurn's Tower
and it was combination of greens and easy blues. She didn't see one white in
the entire tower while they were there. They explored the whole area of the
skeletons. But, although they went down to the necro badgers underneath,
they didn't go very far into tem. All the badgers we saw were blue -- none
green. Which is why I say they may go higher.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara Daring, level 26 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain Wanderer, level 20 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 17 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro (Qeynos) /
Jidranth, lvl 7 Iskar Warrior, Solusek Ro /

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
>Sent: Friday, May 26, 2000 8:03 AM

>I haven't used Lament much, having traveled a lot with
>a druid who uses Harmony very well.
>
>Now I am faced with going to Kurn's Tower with my
>group, an undead, indoor dungeon.
>
>A member of my group is telling me lament won't work
>against undead anymore.
>
>Can anyone tell me about this? I'm 24th lvl now and
>have a charisma of 120.
>
>Thanks,
>Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
